dred05 - I want to comment about this statement of yours - 'is that all that you psychotic freaks like popeslayer can do : insult the one and only true religion the Islam.'  It's true they don't say much of importance but Islam is far from the one and only true religion.  I can provide proof and evidence to the fact.  All you have to do is read your own history and it's clear how messed up Muhammad was.  Watch 'Secrets of the Koran' and you'll see he was possessed by the Devil just before he gave any of his dictations.  Let's see he also molested a little girl, slaughtered thousands of innocent caravans, forced thousands to submit to Islam and made women second class citizens.  A good source for this sort of information can be found at Prophet of Doom dot Net.  The maker of the site also wrote a book by the same name.  He was generous enough to put it online for easy access to everyone.  Later everyone.

I forgot to gives some names of Allah - The Devil, Satan, Lucifer, The Deceiver, The Dark Lord, Son of Perdition, Son of the Morning, The Dragon, and Man of all Lies.  There more but those that are off the top of my head.

ahfiri - I want to comment about this statement of yours - 'Btw, u seem to criticise islam but could u explain to me why it is, has been and will alwyas going to be the fastest growing religion in our planet, and please dont give mee an ignorant answer worthy of an retard.' You really need to watch out for typos. I have my troubles but this is ridiculous.  Now to put you in your place.  Read the above statements of mine to get a clue.  It may be the fastest growing religon but that is only because of the numerous amount of kids you have and the fear imposed in the Middle East to be anything but Muslim.  Not to mention lots of people would like to be on the side that appears it will be winning at the end.  I can go on and on but just watch a few videos to understand why Islam is wrong.  Do some research about The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints (The only true and living church/religion upon the face of the earth with which the Lord is pleased.).  You can find lots of info at LDS.org or FairLDS.org.  We have many common beliefs but the problems you have outweigh the things we have in common.  I warn you to seek the truth before it is too late.  I learn more and more about Islam and with the guidance of the Holy Spirit I can discern how evil and wrong it is.  Satan is apparent in all of the negative teachings of Islam.
The more I learn about history the more clearly I see Islam is just like Hitler and the Nazis.  Both are inspired of the Devil.

bodthedog - That is a good point.  Christ said many are like sheep with no shepherd.  That's why we need Christ - The Good Shepherd.

You are the ignorant one that is uneducated if you say that all religions are false.  Actually I've already stated other places you are just a prideful and hateful sinner.  You don't want to feel that what you do could be wrong and that we don't need anyone to tell us how to live.  That's fine if you just want to follow the Devil but we have a much great potential then to waste our time on earth telling others to shut up and leave us alone.  I come as a voice of warning and one that wishes to teach others how to worship God and what great Plan He has for each one of us.  Jesus Christ did live and die for us.  We need him or we are all lost.
